 2022-07792022-06-24,  ,  ,  PCH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature of DANIKA LOUISE GOOSNEY of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Director of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective September 1, 2022.
